result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant shall immediately report to the Sheriff's Department for fingerprinting and photographing.

9:30 AM Defendant Travis R. Bolssen in court, in custody.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Travis R. Bolssen.  Attorney John Luetscher in court for State of Wisconsin. State calls Chief Kevin Schneider who is sworn and testifies.  Cross exam by Defense.  Testimony closed. 
Argument by Defense.  Probable cause found after preliminary hearing. Defendant is bound over to the circuit court. Defense withdraws prompt disposition now that he has counsel.  FPT ON 11/16 AND JT on 12/13 and 12/14 can be removed. Present bond cont'd.
Arraignment scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Jury trial - 12 person on December 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial - 12 person on December 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on December 12, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Phone call from Amy/DA's office and Atty Hansen - scheduled FPTC on 12/11/2022 at 11am and 2 day 12PJT on Dec 13 and 14, 2022.
Speedy Trial.
Preliminary hearing on October 27, 2022 at 09:30 am.

2:01 PM Defendant Travis R. Bolssen appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Travis R. Bolssen.  Prosecuting attorney Amy R. Greenwood Pautzke in court for the State of Wisconsin.   Atty. Hansen requests preliminary hearing within time limits.  Requested that Deft. will be by writ.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 09:30 am.
